title: NR Narayana Murthy’s big regret is refusing wife from joining Infosys
description: Calling himself “wrongly idealistic”, NR Narayana Murthy said in a TV interview that his wife was “more qualified than all seven” engineers including himself who established Infosys together.
content: Infosys co-founder NR Narayana Murthy has expressed regret that he did not let his family members, especially wife Sudha Murty, join the IT giant he helped set up more than four decades ago.
